name: Subversion (itch)
description:
Subversion is a stealth point and click game. Players need to navigate through each level while avoiding detection to complete their overall objective.

With the use of the Super Vision ability, players can identify important objects of people which can aid in the mission.

While moving through each level, players can stand among the various socialites in the area to blend in and not be detected by the various guards, similar to the Assassin's Creed series.
